医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
殷拓私募股权公司 (EQT Private Equity) 将收购 Zeus，一家全球领先的救生医疗手术用先进聚合物组件制造商https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/EQT-Private-Equity-to-acquire-Zeus-a-global-leader-in-advanced-polymer-components-used-in-life- saving-医疗程序.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/EQT-Private-Equity-to-acquire-Zeus-a-global-leader-in-advanced-polymer-components-used-in-life- saving-医疗程序.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943c6646-0ded-44db-9dbe-46a6b9dbd4b2 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:02:00 -0500 EQT Private Equity to acquire Zeus, a global leader in advanced polymer components used in life-saving medical procedures
奇亚籽基因组测序揭示潜在的健康益处在最近发表在《植物科学前沿》上的一项研究中，研究人员展示了奇亚籽参考基因组的组装。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Chia-genome-sequenced-revealing-pottial-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Chia-genome-sequenced-revealing-potential-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=689571c8-1ec8-4518-8561-8a26590b86cf Mon, 18 Dec 2023 10:17:00 -0500 Chia genome sequenced, revealing potential health benefits
新发现可能扩大肉毒杆菌的医疗用途的可能性PSI 研究人员发现了一个令人惊讶的技巧，可以扩大肉毒杆菌毒素 A1（更广为人知的名字是 Botox）作为活性剂的医疗用途的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-discovery-could-expand-the-possibilities-for-medical-use-of-Botox.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-discovery-could-expand-the-possibilities-for-medical-use-of-Botox.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff7d9603-58d4-4c99-84c1-b8956e7807f3 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:14:00 -0500 New discovery could expand the possibilities for medical use of Botox
新的 320 万美元赠款推动合作抗击癌症来自南加州大学、雪松-西奈医疗中心、洛杉矶儿童医院和斯坦福大学不同学科的研究人员聚集在一起，通过新成立的融合科学癌症联盟寻找癌症的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-2432-million-grant-fuels-collaborative-fight-against-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/New-2432-million-grant-fuels-collaborative-fight-against-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3212e12-3740-4c91-8bb8-c061f2e1f309 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:07:25 -0500 New $3.2 million grant fuels collaborative fight against cancers
裸盖菇素可能有益于癌症和重度抑郁症患者II 期临床试验的结果表明，裸盖菇素（一种在裸盖菇属某些蘑菇中发现的致幻化学物质）可能对癌症和重度抑郁症患者有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Psilocybin-may-benefit-individuals-with-cancer-and-major-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Psilocybin-may-benefit-individuals-with-cancer-and-major-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e06d3029-2a07-4f59-898f-ccdd74c9848b Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:58:30 -0500 Psilocybin may benefit individuals with cancer and major depression
研究表明铁积累在衰老和纤维化中起着核心作用研究人员研究了细胞损伤、铁积累、衰老和纤维化之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-suggests-iron-accumulation-plays-a-central-role-in-senescent-and-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-suggests-iron-accumulation-plays-a-central-role-in-senescent-and-城纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec443589-297b-425f-88a1-7b76f6a9bbac Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:44:00 -0500 Study suggests iron accumulation plays a central role in senescence and fibrosis
研究揭示早期疾病与不育之间的联系该研究由 Aoxing Liu 和资深作者 Melinda Mills、Andrea Ganna 以及一个国际团队领导，研究了芬兰和瑞典出生的超过 250 万人的 414 种早期疾病与终生不育之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-reveals-connection- Between-early-life-diseases-and-childless.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-reveals-connection- Between-early-life-diseases-and-childless.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5f2e9c3-e138-4d71-9bd1-32e106e70aa6 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:13:41 -0500 Study reveals connection between early-life diseases and childlessness
只有十分之一的阿片类药物使用障碍患者在服用过量后得到有效治疗根据 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）的最新研究，在因服用过量而去医院就诊后的一周内，只有十分之一的阿片类药物使用障碍患者开始接受已知对减少疾病和死亡非常有效的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Only-1-in-18-people-with-opioid-use-disorder-get- effective-treatment-after-overdose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Only-1-in-18-people-with-opioid-use-disorder-get- effective-treatment-after-overdose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5ccda0b-29aa-4d2a-8b3e-1fee91876e50 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:08:47 -0500 Only 1 in 18 people with opioid use disorder get effective treatment after overdose
研究指出使用降胆固醇药物治疗侵袭性结直肠肿瘤的可能性威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员的一项临床前研究表明，难以检测的结直肠癌前病变（称为锯齿状息肉）以及由此产生的侵袭性肿瘤在很大程度上取决于胆固醇产生的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-points-to-the-possibility-of-using-cholesterol-lowering-drugs-to-treat-aggressive-colorectal-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Study-points-to-the-possibility-of-using-cholesterol-lowering-drugs-to-treat-aggressive-colorectal-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ab77b2c-513e-4793-805a-21d73f6c6c84 Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:37:51 -0500 Study points to the possibility of using cholesterol-lowering drugs to treat aggressive colorectal tumors
抗体治疗可保护移植患者免受 COVID-19 的侵害Cedars-Sinai 综合移植中心的新研究发现，单克隆抗体治疗降低了一大群实体器官移植患者感染 COVID-19 的风险，这些患者服用该药物作为预防该疾病的措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Antibody-treatment-shields-transplant-患者-against-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231218/Antibody-treatment-shields-transplant-患者-against-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3a818ff-6d7e-4c94-829a-1bc68a9137ec Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:28:08 -0500 Antibody treatment shields transplant patients against COVID-19
